snippet: Louisville announced Friday that Coach Rick Pitino would skip next week’s Atlantic Coast Conference media session on the advice of lawyers because of allegations by the escort Katina Powell that the former Cardinals staffer Andre McGee hired...
abstract: University of Louisville basketball coach Rick Pitino will miss Atlantic Coast Conference media session on advice of lawyers due to recent allegations that prostitutes were hired to entertain players and recruits; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Louisville announced Friday that Coach Rick Pitino would skip next week’s Atlantic Coast Conference media session on the advice of lawyers because of allegations by the escort Katina Powell that the former Cardinals staffer Andre McGee hired dancers for sex parties.
